ygData.subject: On research and the petition
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI all, Fire spiral is still broken.  Next time you log in, please take 20 seconds and /bug Fix research on firespiral and update the books .  Thanks all! By
ygData.messageBody:
FYI all, Fire spiral is still broken. Next time you log in, please take 20 seconds and /bug "Fix research on firespiral and update the books". Thanks all!

By the way, if any of you run into problems researching a spell, successfully make a spell, or just want to see what the heck you all can make without learning 4 languages and blowing 30pp, visit http://www.calpoly.edu/~sdunn/wizards.html

And oh yes, add me to the petition! A little improvement to my mana regen or a new spell is always welcome!

Fastus Atrox
